### MOSAIKS: Satellite Imagery + Machine Learning for Everyone


### [Human Development Index](https://www.mosaiks.org/hdi)

##### About Mosaiks HDI

MOSAIKS produce global fine resolution HDI estimates. Our paper, [Global high-resolution Estimates of the United Nations Human Development Index using Satellite Imagery and Machine Learning](https://www.nber.org/papers/w31044) is available as an NBER Working Paper.
